concept.title: Installing the Docfacto Links Servlet
concept.shortdesc: Configuring the Links Servlet is done as follows.

section.p: Deploy the () from the lib directory of the docfacto installation.

The default username and password are both: admin. After redeployment, you can change this at the config file in the following location: /location-you-deployed-servlet-to/docfacto-links-servlet/WEB-INF/config/config.xml.
You should see:
<links> <username>admin</username> <password>admin</password> </links>
After changing the username/password values, you need to reload the servlet for it to take effect.
